1315780.name: The Great Art Heist
1315780.description:
Welcome to the Wild World of Art Heists!

You play as Jack a kid who loves art ever since he could remember. His parents took him to many museums when he was younger, ever since he has wanted to collect art pieces. Take on contracts or collect for yourself.

Jack isn't a trained thief and during his first heist he gets caught by the police and goes to jail. It's not all bad for Jack he meets his mentor in jail. While in jail he learns new skills and that there is a lot of clients where he can make money stealing art pieces.

Can you collect all the art pieces to add to your collection? First you need to get some contracts to gain some initial money so you can fund your heists yourself, don't worry you can still get the pieces you stole for clients but, those who hired you have better security and deadlier security.

Features:


  • Many famous artworks
  • Sneaking
  • Distractions
  • Skill Tree
  • Lets player pick if they would like to "case" the museum/house or to go in blind
  • Add to your collection of artworks, get your favorites or get them all.
1315780.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
